topComments.author: A M
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A √°gua era ador√°vel. Fomos em uma ter√ßa-feira depois da chuva e tivemos isso para n√≥s. Muito limpo. A comida √© muito cara, ent√£o n√£o recebemos nenhum. Experimentei a bebida conta-gotas, muito saborosa. Definitivamente voltaria.  (Original) Water was lovely. We went on a Tuesday after the rain and had it to ourselves. Pretty clean. Food is really pricey so we didn't get any. Tried the panty dropper drink, very tasty. Would definitely go back.

topComments.author: Jacqueline Bailey
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Bela localiza√ß√£o fora da cidade de Belize. Marina de trabalho, restaurante, museu mostrando a hist√≥ria de Belize (tivemos um engenheiro de trem fofo chamado Cisco!), Parque aqu√°tico Kukumba Beach com escorregador de 80 p√©s na lagoa de √°gua salgada. Vistas de navios de cruzeiro adornam o horizonte. Nice loja de presentes com pre√ßos razo√°veis. A equipe muito simp√°tica e prestativa. Foi t√£o bom ver os grandes barcos (concursos de cruzeiro) barco-piloto do porto, e muitos iates enormes e bonitos ir e vir. Amei! A fam√≠lia Woods s√£o grandes anfitri√µes. N√£o perca! Definitivamente vou voltar.  (Original) Beautiful location outside Belize City. Working marina, restaurant, museum showing history of Belize (we had a cute train engineer named Cisco!), Kukumba Beach water park with 80 ft slide into saltwater lagoon. Views of cruise ships adorn the horizon. Nice gift shop with reasonable prices. Staff very friendly & helpful. It was so nice to watch the large boats (cruise tenders) port pilot boat, and many huge beautiful yachts come & go. Loved it! The Woods family are great hosts. Don't miss it!  Definitely going back.

topComments.author: Hoggustina Hoop

As bebidas s√£o muito boas e com bons pre√ßos, os barmen t√™m uma vibra√ß√£o t√£o boa e est√£o sempre dispostos a ajud√°-lo. Boa m√∫sica de dj e excelente ambiente ao redor.  (Original) Excellent place, very look after, very safe, staff is always super friendly and helpful.  Good quality food and clean on the small food shop. The main restaurant it's open now. Drinks are very good and good prices, bartenders have such a good vibe and always happy to help you. Good dj music and great atmosphere all around.

E fiquei surpreendentemente surpreso com o quanto de um grande momento e uma bela √°rea foi falar sobre a melhor hospitalidade  (Original) I always love to Belize but this time I decided just to hang out on their man-made beach with the locals and just have a good time. And I was surprisingly amazed at how much of a great time and a beautiful area was talk about the best hospitality

topComments.author: X
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Praia artificial privada na cidade. O restaurante est√° fechado para reformas devido a reabrir no pr√≥ximo m√™s. Bar e lanchonete aberto, pargo fant√°stico, (pule os nachos), longa lista de drinks oferecidos. Voleibol, escorregador grande, balan√ßo de Tarzan, etc. Praticamente lounge de madeira e cadeiras Adirondack, algumas redes. Alguma sombra sob dossel de palha. Marina, loja de souvenirs, duches exteriores, balne√°rios dispon√≠veis. Muito limpo. A partir de 19/12, m√°scaras para usar quando n√£o estiver comendo, bebendo ou dentro de √°gua.  (Original) Private man-made beach in the city. Restaurant closed for renovations due to re-open next month. Bar and snack shack open, fantastic snapper, (skip the nachos), long list of drinks offered. Volleyball, big slide, Tarzan swing, etc. Mostly wooden lounge & Adirondack chairs, a few hammocks. Some shade under thatch canopies. Marina, gift shop, outdoor showers, changing rooms available. Very clean. As of 12/19 masks to be worn when not eating, drinking, or in the water.

The weather was not what we were expecting raining almost all day.

topComments.author: Mo C (Somemo)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© t√£o bomb√°stico e √© familiar, √≥tima comida e bebidas bomb√°sticas, um DJ ao vivo que est√° tocando, e a loja de presentes √© incr√≠vel.  (Original) This place is so bomb and is family friendly, great food and bomb drinks, a live DJ that be jamming, and the gift shop is amazing.

topComments.author: tahishia powell
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) lugar fofo. quer√≠amos entrar na √°gua para alguns dos brinquedos aqu√°ticos, mas uma vez que eu estava errado na barraca de comida, decidimos sair.  este n√£o era o nosso lugar pretendido, mas n√£o t√≠nhamos planos s√≥lidos e permitimos que o motorista de t√°xi local nos convencesse. quando vimos pela primeira vez, ficamos muito felizes. isso foi at√© que nos levou 2 horas para obter dois pratos errados. primeiro meu marido ficou na fila para nachos. ele pediu para colocar o creme de leite do lado porque ele n√£o gosta, enquanto eu gosto. n√£o s√≥ os nachos servidos com creme azedo despejados sobre eles, eles tamb√©m estavam faltando os gr√£os. OK. n√£o √© um grande neg√≥cio. mesmo tendo demorado uma hora e ele acabou gastando mais dinheiro por um prato servido por um local.  ent√£o fui pedir algo simples: uma quesadilla de frango. minha ordem exata: por favor, apenas frango e queijo. 45 minutos depois, recebi uma quesdadilla com frango, queijo, jalapenos e milho. agora, eu posso entender se os ingredientes j√° est√£o misturados (embora isso n√£o seja o que me disseram), eu gostaria de saber disso quando eu pedi. me d√™ uma chance de mudar meu pedido antecipadamente. quando eu levei o prato de volta para pedir uma troca uniforme, me disseram que os chilis n√£o eram picantes e que n√£o havia nada que eles fariam para corrigi-lo. frio. sem argumentos meus, sa√≠mos e nunca mais voltaremos. n√£o ajudou que as bebidas tamb√©m sejam bastante dilu√≠das, embora isso pare√ßa ser comum nesses lugares de "passe di√°rio" üòí  (Original) cute place. we wanted to get into the water for some of the water toys, but once i was done wrong at the food shack, we decided to leave.  this wasn't our intended place, but we didn't have solid plans and allowed the local taxi driver to talk us into it. when we first saw it, we were pretty happy. that was until it took us 2 hours to get two wrong dishes. first my husband stood in line for nachos. he asked them to put the sour cream on the side bc he doesn't like it, while i do. not only were the nachos served with sour cream dumped all over them, they were also missing the beans. ok. not too big a deal. even though it took an hour and he ended up spending more money for a plate being served by a local.  then i went to order something simple: a chicken quesadilla. my exact order: please just chicken and cheese. 45 mins later, i received a quesdadilla with chicken, cheese, jalapenos and corn. now, i can understand if the ingredients are already mixed together (though this isn't what i was told), i would have liked to know that when i ordered it. give me a chance to change my order up front. when i took the plate back to ask for an even exchange, i was told the chilis weren't spicy and that there was nothing they would do to correct it. cool. no arguments from me, we left and won't ever go back. it didn't help that the drinks are also pretty watered down, though that seems to be common at these "day pass" places üòí

Expect bar type food.
